attributes.action: Reopen all England’s COVID-19 nightingale hospitals
attributes.additional_details: Because the nightingale hospitals are empty and they are ideal to be used as a big COVID 19 hospital Freeing up even more beds in our normal hospitals allowing the backlog of cancer patients & all operations to be carried out for the remainder of the COVID epidemic in the UK
attributes.background: I would like the uk government to reopen all  the nightingale hospitals In England so they can be used to treat every COVID 19 patient

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on hospital capacity and how beds are allocated is a matter for the NHS and individual trusts.
